website_summaries.verdict: This is a reliable, lightweight stick from a trusted company, designed for players to scoop with confidence, catch well, and throw with accuracy.
pros: This stick is lightweight, and the scoop angle provides whip and accuracy on a straight head
It's flexible where it should be to easily scoop up balls
At the same time, the stiff sidewalls allow for control
There's also enough give to hug the ball, which is important for control when catching and throwing
cons: The strings are generally reliable but not quite bulletproof

customer_reviews.title: The NV3 is a nice head for defense and excellent for scooping ground balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old LAXer to replace her deBeer NV3. The NV3 is a nice head for defense and excellent for scooping ground balls, but the Exult seems to be a better all-around stick. Her catching, passing and shooting noticeably improved right away.
customer_reviews.author: J/R

customer_reviews.title: Great stick- holds up very well for ladies lax
customer_reviews.text: Great stick- holds up very well for ladies lax. Strings on the head are good quality. Very happy with the product. Gauge of the strings could be one up- only reason not a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Molitor

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter originally had a Stik from Play it again sports.....now the toddler play with that stick! This STX Exult has helped my daughter improve her scooping and catching skills. Lighter and makes a difference overall in her practice and play.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Great stick with great grip.
customer_reviews.text: Great stick for my daughter who is 12 and tall. Nice bright head color makes.her easy to.spot on the field. Its light with a fantastic grip that she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Arnott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stick but missing a part.
customer_reviews.text: Stick was missing white foam/rubber stick-on pad at the bottom of the mesh pocket. Checked the box and all packing material for this piece. The stick still has a slight bit of sticky residue from when it was on there. Daughter had to use the stick and I could not wait to send it back. Now out to search for a replacement part to make this new stick complete.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Great stick!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters first year playing Lax , she plays center and loves the stick! Would definately recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Perin

customer_reviews.title: Great feel fir the ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Great feel fir the ball. Easier to dig the ground balls on the run and pinpoint release on shots.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Lischuk

customer_reviews.title: Lacrosse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lacrosse stick for my daughter. The grip is very nice as well as the overall stick. She is pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Lightweight and awesome quality. Perfect for my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin White

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's second stick. She liked using it more than her first one.
customer_reviews.author: MrsC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this stick. It's really helped my daughters game!
customer_reviews.author: Cari Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lacrosse stick. My daughter loves it! The grip is really nice as is the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter loves this stick and her team has stick envy.
customer_reviews.author: cool cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old has improved her game because of this stick
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle and light
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stick. Easy to handle and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Charlene W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks amazing out on the field/turf and works very well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chicks with Sticks
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's have always played with Brine, but they love this stick. This is the best stick for the money. No need to buy the 500. The benefits do not outweigh the extra $100. STX does have different sticks for positions. This is a middie stick, my defender uses the Crux, and they can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: mchams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: High quality, nice grip, just a little texture, but not too much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this. We have had it for the entire Lacrosse season and she loves it. It also meets league regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great lax stick!!!!!!!!! easily get loose but i like the weight!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Wu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stx everrrr!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing stick that must girl have. I'm so happy to have one and first in our team to ever used it @ the sand storm tournament palm spring!!!
customer_reviews.author: julius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stick!
customer_reviews.text: This stick is awesome. Superlightweight. Rubberized paint on stick makes gripping easier. Head makes catching easier and also scooping/picking up ball easier. Don't buy a beginner stick, just spend the extra loot and get this one for your lacrosse player. They'll love the performance and features of this stick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: STX Lacrosse Exult 300 Girls Complete Stick
product_meta.description: The STX Lacrosse EXULT 300 women's complete stick is the midfielders stick of choice for precise shooting, ground ball pick-up, blocking shots and taking draws.
feature_bullets: Scoop angle provides whip and accuracy on a straight head
Runway Pocket is a unique, overlapping center string system allowing the two center runners to flex out and hug the ball
Flexible scoop for easy ground ball pick up
Stiff sidewalls for stability and control
